data.name: Mythic
data.detailed_description:
PLAY THE FREE VERSION NOW

The free version features the first boss and gauntlet minigame with global leaderboards!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2018990/Mythic_Origins/


About the Game

If you're interested in Mythic, please wishlist and follow us!


We created a unique fusion of the MMORPG and Roguelite genres, incorporating our favorite elements from each. Discover a world packed with puzzles, enemies, bosses, and treasure. Join forces with fellow heroes to hunt down the gods, or strike out alone and be the first to discover uncharted territory. Become Mythic.

MASSIVELY MULTIPLAYER

  • Fully online. Enter a massively multiplayer experience with up to hundreds of people on your screen at any given time.
  • Choose your party. Navigate the world alone, with a few friends, or with anyone you meet along the way.
  • Build your character. Five unique skill trees, each reflecting the power of the five elemental biomes of the world.
  • Collect your loot. 70+ unique items, each coming in a variety of item levels and rarities, and able to be further customized through crafting.

TRUE EXPLORATION

  • Maze world. The world of Mythic is an infinite maze that extends in all directions and is separated into five elemental biomes: air, water, earth, fire, and order.
  • Procedural generation. Each room in the world is a new, procedurally generated challenge filled with challenging puzzles and winding mazes.
  • Discovery. Mysteries are scattered throughout Mythic. Will you be the first to uncover secrets hidden deep in the maze? Or explore an area no other player has ever seen?
  • Rewarding Achievements. The first few players to discover uncharted territory will earn rare treasure. High scoring players in minigames will earn equipment only they can wield. Real accomplishments mean real rewards in Mythic.

ROGUELIKE ELEMENTS

  • Live. Die. Repeat. Prepare for challenging combat and gameplay that will lead to frequent and punishing deaths.
  • Many Roguelites. Each elemental biome in Mythic is designed as a self-contained roguelite. Death will return you to the start of the biome you are currently exploring.
  • No Permadeath. Complete a biome to unlock new abilities and areas. Completed biomes stay complete, even if you die.

data.short_description: Mythic is a Roguelite MMO where you explore an infinite, procedurally generated labyrinth. Discover a world packed with puzzles, enemies, bosses, and treasure. Join forces with fellow heroes to hunt down the gods, or strike out alone and be the first to discover uncharted territory. Become Mythic.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP 1
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play.
